AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Schwarz
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Keep her away from the faint of heart.\nSchwarz, Operator of Rhodes Island, will protect you from the shadows.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: W
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Nothing good ever comes of her laughter. And she's always laughing.\nW, Sarkaz mercenary, is the single most dangerous signal on the battlefield.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Executor
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Be careful what you wish for, because he really can accomplish things that border on absurdity or impossibility.\nExecutor, a professional undertaker sent from the Laterano Embassy, is glad to fulfill any and all contracts.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Exusiai
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Is it really fine to trust her with any cargo? Exusiai, employee of Penguin Logistics, will clear out everything in the way using her guns.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Greythroat
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: If you're ever on the receiving end of her evil eye, it's not necessarily meant for you.\nGreyThroat, Sniper Operator of Rhodes Island, brings eternal peace with each of her steady shots.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Jessica
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: If only she wasn't such a scaredy-cat… Jessica, Sniper Operator of Blacksteel, will provide effective attack power for the squad with her professional skills.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Pinecone
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: She looks half-asleep, but her work's laser-accurate. How does she do it? Construction worker Pinecone, all spaced out while she gets the job done.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Provence
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: She also keeps an eye on everyone's health.\nProvence, Catastrophe Messenger of Rhodes Island, always keeps an eye on the movements of Catastrophes and the enemy.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Rosa
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Give her some time.\nRosa, a member of the Ursus Student Self-Government Group, is ready to welcome a new life.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Rosmontis
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Her equipment's not on her. No need to worry about her remembering you ate her snacks yesterday. Probably.\nRosmontis, Rhodes Island Elite Operator, pushes open your office door by hand.
